title: For any TY 2025-26 onwards
description: This endpoint enables you to retrieve the periodic income and expenses for a Foreign Property business. A National Insurance number, business ID, and tax year are required. Please note that this endpoint is only available for tax years starting from 2025-26.

submittedOn.description: The date the UK property were submitted, in the format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ`

fromDate.description: The first day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

toDate.description: The last day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

ukProperty.description: Object holding the income and expenses of the UK property business for the period.

income.description: Object holding the income details for the period.

premiumsOfLeaseGrant.description: Premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places..

reversePremiums.description: Amount paid by a landlord or outgoing tenant to induce a new tenant to enter into a leasehold agreement. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places..

periodAmount.description: Total rents from property (but not ground rents, rent charges and rent-a-room rental income). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places..

taxDeducted.description: Tax already deducted from the rental income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places..

otherIncome.description: Total amount of rent and any income for services provided to tenants. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places..

rentARoom.description: Object holding the rents received for the period.

rentsReceived.description: Total rents received from properties. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

expenses.description: Object holding the expenses for the period.

premisesRunningCosts.description: Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents and other costs. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

repairsAndMaintenance.description: Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents and other costs. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

financialCosts.description: Loan interest and other financial costs. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

professionalFees.description: Legal, management and other professional fees. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfServices.description: Cost of services provided, including wages. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

other.description: Other allowable property expenses. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

residentialFinancialCost.description: The residential financial cost deductible from rental income (tax relief). The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

travelCosts.description: Car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

residentialFinancialCostsCarriedForward.description: Amount of residential financial costs carried forward. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rentARoom.description: Object holding the rents claimed for the period.

amountClaimed.description: The amount of UK Furnished Holiday Lettings rent claimed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

consolidatedExpenses.description:
The sum of all allowable expenses for the specified period. You can either submit a consolidatedExpenses value or individual expenses (premisesRunningCosts, repairsAndMaintenance, financialCosts, professionalFees, costOfServices, travelCosts, other).
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
